issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://player.899thewave.fm](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplayer.899thewave.fm) ### Comment Username: @ripripp > 1. Go to the live streaming webpage for a (any?) radio station of the MBS Radio chain: > > https://www.mbsradio.com/stations/ > > This includes, for example: > > * https://player.899thewave.fm/ > > * https://player.max983.ca/ > > * https://player.cjcbradio.com/ > > and also the equivalent pages hosted through the LeanPlayer audio streaming system: > > http://mbsradio.leanplayer.com/[station call letters] , such as http://mbsradio.leanplayer.com/CKCWFM/ > > > 2. Try clicking the play button. > > 3. It is grayed out. Nothing happens. > > 4. Disable AdGuard Annoyances filter. (Also disable the EasyList - Cookie Notices filter, if that happens to be enabled as well in uBlock Origin.) > > 5. Refresh or open a new tab of one of those MBS pages and try again. > > 6. This time, a cookie notice appears, and after selecting the "Accept" button, the play button becomes available. > > ### Screenshots
